mapper.select: SELECT MNO, MNAME, EMAIL, CRE_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, MNO, MNAME, EMAIL, CRE_DATE FROM (SELECT MNO, MNAME, EMAIL, CRE_DATE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY CRE_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUE(MNO, EMAIL, PWD, MNAME, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE) VALUES(MEMBER_MNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{password} , #{name}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
